judge_prompt: You are an expert in analyzing Boolean Networks (BNs) and will analyze some BNs based on certain context.
The context of the given data is:
The scored candidate coupled ODE is:
Your task is to analyze the candidate Boolean Network and determine if they are suitable for the given context and your own knowledge.

You should give a score ranging from 1 to 10 to measure the quality of the ODE that reflects the alignment with the context. Higher score indicates better quality. Give the score directly without outputting any other content.
